title: Catatonia
description: A comprehensive guide to Catatonia, including diagnosis, management, and clinical considerations based on DSM-5 criteria.
publicSummary: Catatonia is a mental health condition classified in the DSM-5 under Schizophrenia Spectrum and Other Psychotic Disorders. This content provides educational information based on current clinical guidelines and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
category: Schizophrenia Spectrum and Other Psychotic Disorders
tags: schizophrenia spectrum and other psychotic disorders
